trans:

the second party should be legal and their documents must be complete which are (a valid registration form, valid driver’s residency permit, valid driver’s license
, valid insurance, driver’s authorization from Absher) and for the party
a valid driver’s card, valid operating card, and a valid periodic inspection.
The second party is responsible for bringing the trucks and drivers to the site for work. If any driver is absent or fails to comply with traffic regulations
relevant authorities.

Preamble:
Clause 1 "
The above contract is considered an integral part of this contract and complements it
" Contract Duration:
Clause 2 "
The duration of this contract is one year, starting from the date of signing, and is renewable for additional periods according to the agreement of both parties, unless
one of the parties informs the other party if they wish to stop work, with a notice period of no less than ten days from
the end of the original or renewed period.
The subject of the Contract:

of the first party per the terms specified in this contract
